import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators} from "@angular/forms"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {ProductService} from "../../Services/product.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.scss'] }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit { signUpForm!: FormGroup; products: any[] = []; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private router: Router, private productService: ProductService) { } ngOnInit() { this.productService.getAllProducts().subscribe((data: any) => { this.products = data; //this.initForm(); }) // initForm() { // this.signUpForm = this.formBuilder.group( { // email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], // password: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]){5,18}/)]] // }); // } // onSubmit() { // const email = this.signUpForm.get('email')?.value; // const password = this.signUpForm.get('password')?.value; // console.log('Email : ' + email); // console.log('Mot de passe : ' + password); // this.router.navigate(["/''"]); // } }}
